CustomField.description: The name of the Named Credential record that stores the authentication information needed to invoke this API, if any. The Integration_Configuration__c object stores the Named Credential information for the third party system, if the third party service provides separate authentication that's not API specific. Over and above that, the API_Named_Credential field stores API specific authentication information, if any.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Name of the Named Credential record that stores the login credentials needed to invoke this API, if any
CustomField.label: API Named Credential
